newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexican stocks seen soft on Dow Jones, peso weak.
newsitem.headline: Mexican stocks seen soft on Dow Jones, peso weak.

text.p: Traders saw stocks opening on the downside and tracking similar movements on Wall Street but in thin volume from a lack of investor interest.
"There were sellers in the market, but buyers were waiting for lower prices, so volume was thin and I see that trend continuing,' a desk trader said about Wednesday trading.
Dealers situated support for the blue chip IPC index at 3,760 points, compared to Wednesday's close at 3,774.02.
